string.value: You're really starting to look like a Thief. #b#p1052001##k wants to help you with one last training session.
#p1052001# wants you to slay #r10 #o1120100#s#k as a test. #o1120100#s are one of the strongest monsters around #m103000000#. Stay alert. \n\n#o1120100# #r#a21431##k
You destroyed 10 #o1120100#. Wasn't easy, but you feel like you're well on your way to becoming an amazing Thief.
애송이 도적 친구. 지금까지 수련을 잘 따라와줬네. 여전히 허술한 구석이 있지만 그래도 어느 정도 도적다운 모습이 된 걸 보니 정말 기쁘구만. 그럼 이제 자네의 실력을 한 번 점검해 봐야겠지?
실력 점검은 간단해. 옥토퍼스 10마리를 사냥하면 되는 거니까. 뭐 지금까지 상대했던 녀석들보다 훨씬 옥토퍼스가 강하기야 하겠지만... 자네가 지금까지 수련을 열심히 했다면 그리 어렵지 않은 상대일 테니 어서 가서 해치우라고.
시험이 두려운 건가? 쯧. 겁쟁이로군. 겁 먹을 필요 없어. 자네가 통과하지 못할 정도로 어려운 과제는 아예 애초부터 안 낼 거니까 말이야.
Beginner Thief. You've been doing a good job till now. I can see some of your weak points. But you're a Thief now. Let me test you.
It's simple:Hunt #rten #o1120100##k. They're much stronger than #o0130100# which you've dealt with. If you've been doing well with training, it's not that hard. Now go and get them!
Are you afraid of the test? Don't be! I won't give you any test that you can't pass!
You succeeded to eliminate ten #o1120100#. Hahaha. Quite good. You were beginner who can't do anything. Now you made it thanks to Dark Lord. Haha. I'm really happy.
But this is only beginning as a Thief. There is a long way to be a real Thief. The way of Thief...It is tough. If you make efforts, you can make it. Be calm and concentrate on your job.
You haven't eliminated #rten #o1120100##k yet. Don't make haste or you can't concentrate. Relax and focus on your goal.
